${ModID}:PenanceShock.NAME: Penance Shock
${ModID}:PenanceShock.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and Apply !M! thedragonkin:Penance to a random enemy. NL Channel Lightning
${ModID}:PenanceShock.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and Apply !M! thedragonkin:Penance to a random enemy twice. NL Channel Lightning

${ModID}:SearingLight.NAME: Searing Light
${ModID}:SearingLight.DESCRIPTION: Take !M! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Channel ${ModID}:Light

${ModID}:RazorWind.NAME: Razor Wind
${ModID}:RazorWind.DESCRIPTION: Channel ${ModID}:Light. NL Gain !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Confession. NL Take !M! damage.

${ModID}:WeightofContrition.NAME: Weight of Contrition
${ModID}:WeightofContrition.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${ModID}:Penance. NL Increase ${ModID}:Penance HP loss by !${ModID}:m2! this combat.

${ModID}:ChainsofTruth.NAME: Chains of Truth
${ModID}:ChainsofTruth.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Apply !M! ${ModID}:Penance to ALL enemies. NL Channel Lightning.

${ModID}:SacredTrial.NAME: Sacred Trial
${ModID}:SacredTrial.DESCRIPTION: Take !M! damage. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies.

${ModID}:HolyWrath.NAME: Holy Wrath
${ModID}:HolyWrath.DESCRIPTION: Evoke a ${ModID}:Light. NL ${ModID}:Manifest Lightning equal to your ${ModID}:Confession. NL Exhaust

${ModID}:Absolution.NAME: Absolution
${ModID}:Absolution.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${ModID}:Penance. Whenever you take damage this combat, increase ${ModID}:Penance HP loss by !${ModID}:m2! this combat.

${ModID}:JudgementDay.NAME: Judgement Day
${ModID}:JudgementDay.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Manifest !M! Lightning. NL Whenever you channel Lightning Apply !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Penance to a random enemy.
